channel.title: Chapter 2: Deep Learning Basics on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 2: Deep Learning Basics on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)

item.title: Chapter 02.01: Optimization
item.description: This chapter discusses optimization and the optimization algorithm gradient descent. The variants of stochastic gradient descent are commonly used for deep learning.

item.title: Chapter 02.02 Deep Feedforward Networks
item.description: This chapter discusses Deep Forward Networks, the simplest type of neural networks and some common activation functions, also called non-linearities.

item.title: Chapter 02.03: Backpropagation
item.description: The ability to scale neural networks is a key criterion for the success of modern neural networks. The backpropagation algorithm powers the efficient computation of the gradients.

item.title: Chapter 02.04 Regularization
item.description: Regularization provides the possibility to guide the learning process.
